HeadComp.title: Freshchat vs MSG91 | Compare Communication APIs & Messaging Platforms
HeadComp.description: Compare Freshchat and MSG91 to find the right communication platform for your business. Explore differences in pricing, features, ease of integration, and support to make an informed decision.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs Freshchat
CompareBannerComp.subheading: Freshchat and MSG91 both support WhatsApp business messaging, but Freshchat focuses on omnichannel customer engagement with AI-driven support, advanced segmentation, and multi-platform integrations, while MSG91 offers strong WhatsApp automation alongside broad omnichannel messaging, AI-powered journeys, and localized support—making MSG91 more suited for scalable, multichannel campaigns.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91 offers a broad omnichannel communication solution including SMS, email, and WhatsApp, with features like AI-powered customer journeys, dynamic segmentation, and detailed analytics—suited for businesses needing scalable, flexible, and cost-effective messaging across multiple channels.

content.name: Freshchat
content.des: Freshchat is an omnichannel customer messaging platform with strong AI-driven support, advanced customer segmentation, and integrations across WhatsApp, web, email, and social channels—best for businesses focused on personalized multi-platform engagement.

features.pricing: Costlier, Added margin on Meta pricing
features.multi_agent_support: Free agents till 3 users, extra charges for extra users
features.ai_chatbot_integration: No code chatbot, costlier as we go for complex bots
features.unlimited_bot_creation: Free trial allows 3 basic bots; more flows need a paid plan.
features.whatsapp_payments: WhatsApp Pay checkout in Catalog with Razorpay and PayU
features.whatsapp_catalogs: Supports WhatsApp catalog with easy integration and product sharing in chat.
features.integration_and_plugins: Freshchat’s free trial lacks third-party integrations; the Basic Plan allows 2, with more on pay-as-you-go.
features.otp_verification: Does not provide OTP verification as a built-in feature
features.otp_widget: Freshchat doesn’t offer a website OTP widget.
features.customer_support_quality: Support via WhatsApp and email only.
features.meta_ads_trackings_conversion: Integrates with Meta Ads for Clicks, conversion tracking, and real-time insights.

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
